comments.comment: What ever the cabinet is,  who ever is selected from what ever party they have prove that they have done the major changes with no curruption. If the country, the people feels this change and the difference of course no one should feel bad. The honesty and the trust  this needs to be improved from any elected cabinet. No colour or party is to looked into. Today this beautiful country what has happened to it. What a mess we are all are in. How stupid are the public to support the thief's, and those murderers. At least now the selected cabinet should build this country if not it will never.                 The most important area is the LAW AND ORDER OF THE COUNTRY. ALL THE LAWYERS SHOULD STICK TO THE HONESTY OF THE OATHS THEY HAVE GIVEN. THE PRISONS ARE PACKED WITH THESE SMALL UN NOTICED CASES FOR A STUPID REASON. AND THE BIG FISH IS SWIMMING WITH THE CURRUPTED MONEY WHY AND HOW?????? FOR WHAT REASON ARE THEY STILL FREE???????  WE ALL SHOULD NOT FORGET TO REMEMBER ALL THESE RELIGIOUS BOOKS ARE MEANT TO READ AND RESPECT EVEN THOUGH IT IS NOT READ BUT THAT SO CALLED INNER FEELINGS SHOULD EFFECT YOUR WORKING NERVES. WHY ALL THE COURTS FROM ALL THE DISTRICTS THEY NEED TO RESPECT THE RELIGION WHAT THEY PREACH AND FROM THE MAGISTRATE TILL THOSE CATEGORISED LAWYERS SHOULD RESPECT WHAT THEY WEAR AND THE REASON FOR BEEN GIVEN A POSITION.
comments.author: rienziemarina Ousman
